required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of RC28-E Injection in Diabetic Macular Edema
clinical_study.official_title: Protein by Dual Blockage of VEGF and FGF-2) in Subjects With Diabetic Macular Edema.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a non-randomized, open-label, multicenter, 48-week study to investigate the efficacy, safety and pharmacokinetics of RC28-E injection in the treatment of patients with diabetic macular edema.

primary_outcome.measure: Mean change from baseline in BCVA at 24 week;
primary_outcome.description: BCVA=Best-corrected visual acuity;Measurement of visual acuity with Early Treatment Diabetic Retinopathy Study (ETDRS) charts.

primary_outcome.measure: Mean change from baseline in BCVA at 52 week;
primary_outcome.description: Measurement of visual acuity with Early Treatment Diabetic Retinopathy Study (ETDRS) charts.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean change from baseline in BCVA at every visit during treatment period;
secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of visual acuity with Early Treatment Diabetic Retinopathy Study (ETDRS) charts.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean change from baseline in central subfield thickness at 12, 24, 36, 52 week.
secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of central subfield thickness by OCT.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of subjects with VA improvement (who gained >0 letters, ≥5 letters, ≥10 letters, ≥ 15 letters in their BCVA) from baseline at 52 week;
secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of visual acuity with Early Treatment Diabetic Retinopathy Study (ETDRS) charts.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of subjects with VA worsen (who lost ≥5 letters, ≥10 letters, ≥15 letters in their BCVA) from baseline at 52 week;
secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of visual acuity with Early Treatment Diabetic Retinopathy Study (ETDRS) charts.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of subjects with BCVA ≥ 68 letters(a visual acuity Snellen equivalent of 20/40 or better) at 52 week;
secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of visual acuity with Early Treatment Diabetic Retinopathy Study (ETDRS) charts.
Incidence of AE in ocular and non-ocular

arm_group.description: In the loading phase (from week 0 to week 8), the study eye will receive intravitreal injection of 1.0 mg RC28-E every 4 weeks, for 3 consecutive times; From then on to the 48th week, the patients were visited every 4 weeks and given medicine every 8 weeks.

In the loading phase (from week 0 to week 16), the study eye will receive intravitreal injection of 1.0mg RC28-E every 4 weeks, for 5 consecutive times;In the as needed (pro re nata,PRN)phase (from then on to week 48), the study eye will receive the same dose on an PRN schedule based upon the physician assessment in accordance with pre-specified criteria.

In the loading phase (from week 0 to week 8), the study eye will receive intravitreal injection of 2.0mg RC28-E every 4 weeks, for 3 consecutive times; From then on to the 48th week, the patients were visited every 4 weeks and given medicine every 8 weeks.

In the loading phase (from week 0 to week 16), the study eye will receive intravitreal injection of 2.0mg RC28-E every 4 weeks, for 5 consecutive times;In the as needed (pro re nata,PRN)phase (from then on to week 48), the study eye will receive the same dose on an PRN schedule based upon the physician assessment in accordance with pre-specified criteria.

In the loading phase (from week 0 to week 8), the study eye will receive intravitreal injection of Conbercept every 4 weeks, for 3 consecutive times;In the as needed (pro re nata,PRN)phase (from then on to week 48), the study eye will receive the same dose on an PRN schedule based upon the physician assessment in accordance with pre-specified criteria.

intervention.description: a chimric decoy receptor trap fusion protein by dual blockage of VEGF and FGF
